alert.note: Alert for Banner; Box Butte; Cheyenne; Dawes; Kimball; Morrill; Scotts Bluff; Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 29 at 4:56PM CDT until May 29 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Box Butte County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... Eastern Scotts Bluff County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... Northern Cheyenne County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... Northeastern Kimball County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... Morrill County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... Northeastern Banner County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... Dawes County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... Central Sioux County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... * Until 445 PM MDT. * At 354 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles southeast of Harrison to near Kilpatrick Lake to 6 miles north of Potter, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Alliance, Chadron, Bridgeport, Bayard, Crawford, Hemingford, Potter, Dalton, Harrison, Gurley, Alliance Airport, Northport, Montrose, Angora, Box Butte Dam, Fort Robinson Campground, Chadron Campground, Court House And Jail Rocks, Berea and Flahertys Corner. This includes Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 35 and 42. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Banner; Box Butte; Cheyenne; Dawes; Kimball; Morrill; Scotts Bluff; Sioux
